data.message: And why even ask, it's not like you take our opinions into consideration when making the changes.  Don't get me wrong, I understand it's your site and it's free for us, but even when something is free, if people don't like it they won't use it.  Just my 2 cents.

replies.message: I thought it was something crazy on my pc that if I scrolled past a video it started playing.. UGH>> turn them off!!
Sorry but I don't like your "new design"...
It's all about the cash flow.  I don't like any of it.  I can get all the news I need.  Don't try to force feed me.
I Hate that the videos start playing automatically. If I want to watch them I can turn them on myself.
I am debating right now whether to continue on FB or not....I think it has DICTATED long enough about what THEY want and not what I want.
Since you asked finally, I do not like it.
sorry don't like it .... I was going crazy trying to figure out what happened to me computer.......
The whole thing sucks and you only make changes  so you can jam it down our throats.  It really doesn't matter what we think because you don't listen anyway, so what is the point of asking.
I pay for some of the game extras for my daughter. that's not gonna happen anymore until they change it for the better and leave it alone
i rarely go on it like I did before they changed it and don't plan on it either
i agree  put it bac like it was :(
